book.synopsis: Ranma Saotome never thought a martial arts training mission to China would turn out like this! An accidental dunk in a cursed spring changes boy Ranma into a young girl, every time he is splashed with cold water. Hot water reverses the effect - but only until next time!
book.dimensions: Height: 7.25 Inches, Length: 5 Inches, Weight: 0.45 Pounds, Width: 0.5 Inches
